column1: 2017. By an amended petition filed on 3rd October 2019, the Petitioners have sought

column3: A Writ of Certiorari to quash the decisions in ‘P2’, ‘P27’ and ‘P29’;
A Writ of Mandamus directing the 4th, 7th and 8th Respondents to complete the
acquisition process and vest the land in the said School;
A Writ of Prohibition preventing the 4th Respondent from handing over the land
